SEARCH
Package com.ibm.security.access.user

Class LDAPProperties

java.lang.Object
com.ibm.security.access.user.LDAPProperties
public class LDAPProperties extends Object
This class contains the LDAP Properties which can be overriden using the Properties map exposed in several init methods. All values of should be Strings.
